metadata.subject: Catholic Church
Austrian Succession, War of, 1740-1748
metadata.title: Mandement de Monseigneur l'archevêque de Paris, qui ordonne que le Te Deum sera chanté dans toutes les eglises de son diocése, en actions de graces de la prise de la ville de Dendermonde
metadata.creator: Catholic Church.Archdiocese of Paris (France).Archbishop (1729-1746 : Vintimille du Luc)
Catholic Church. Archdiocese of Paris (France). Archbishop (1729-1746 : Vintimille du Luc), creator
Vintimille du Luc, Charles-Gaspard-Guillaume de, 1655-1746
Louis XV, King of France, 1710-1774
Hérissant, Claude-Jean-Baptiste, approximately 1690-1762, printer, publisher
metadata.note: Bound in a volume with manuscript title page: Conquestes & campagne du roi et du dauphin en mil sept cent quarente ci[n]q & pieces à ce sujet.
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez Claude Herissant, imprimeur de Monseigneur l'archevêque, rue Notre-Dame, à la Croix d'or
metadata.physical-description: 8 pages, [1] folded leaf of plates ; 25 cm
metadata.description: Title vignette (arms of Archbishop of Paris); initial; head-piece
Engraving on folded leaf: Representation du feu d'artifice
"Lettre du roi, a Monseigneur l'archevesque de Paris": pages 7-8; dated: 16. août 1745
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title is on the cover page. Uneven binding. Skewed text. Irregular pagination. Page numbers are defaced.
